data.message: Thank you Facebook,every things is so easy in palm of your hand.It is easy to connect and find fam.that I never know.Thanks fb.it is a new inspiration and every things is so easy and let you spend more time to communicate with friend and family.

replies.message: Hey, Hannibal. Thanks for sharing with us! If there's anything else we can do to improve your Facebook experience, please let us know: http://bit.ly/2dUWovn. -Monica
Thank you Monica I think we have so much things it difficult to improve write now that we need sometings more
If you fave sam 'tayp of Dystoni can jo send mi a mail an vourt distany yau have, bikose if ju dont kan vork more 1 or 2 svidis mail. den jo kan drop tis BAD
I like being able to reconnect with old friends but I sure don't appreciate seeing my ex-husband's wife coming up as a suggested friend.
